welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Nairn! This charming seaside town is known for its stunning beaches and rich history. We hope you have a wonderful stay and take time to explore all that Nairn has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Inverness Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Inverness Airport, primarily used for domestic flights within the United Kingdom.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kinloss Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kinloss Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free. No password required.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at RAF Station Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at RAF Station Airport is equipped to handle a wide range of cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
